column1: robert r. mally| robert r. mally. born: february 24
column5: beloved husband of the late lynn mally; devoted father of christina ramey and robert f. mally jr.; grandfather of ryan robert ramey; dear brother of steve mally. the family will receive friends at the connelly funeral home of dundalk
